subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p:
This component is used to store properties in AWS SSM Parameter Store. It does support features.
You need to configure the environment properly: See credentials and region configuration.
If your application is hosted on EC2, simply attach a role with the following ssm policies to your instance:
{ "Version": "2012-10-17", "Statement": [ { "Sid": "Stmt1551219711385", "Action": [ "ssm:DeleteParameter", "ssm:DeleteParameters", "ssm:GetParameter", "ssm:GetParameters", "ssm:GetParametersByPath", "ssm:PutParameter" ], "Effect": "Allow", "Resource": "*" } ] }
If you need to load some data in the store, use the loadFromXMLFile or loadFromXMLFileStream methods, using an xml file with the ff4j xsd.
